p.span: Beginning the week of April 6th, new content will be released every Monday through the end of the school year to allow students to continue learning while helping families keep track of resources and assignments.

strong.span: Click the buttons below to access the new information each week!

div.p: Student belongings can be picked up between 8:00 a.m. and 1:00 p.m. on Tuesday, April 21st and Thursday April 23rd, 2020.
PreK & 1st grade items can be picked up in the office parking lot (North). Kindergarten items can be picked up in the kindergarten parking lot (South).

Persons picking up items are asked to stay in their vehicle. Please drive into the designated lot and a teacher will ask the child’s name and class. A bag containing the student’s items will be placed next to your vehicle. We are asking to reduce contact that you exit your vehicle at this time and pick up the bag. There will also be a tote placed on the sidewalk to place any items that need to be returned to the school (i.e. textbooks, library books, literacy backpacks, etc).

Student belongings can be picked up between 8:00 a.m. and 1:00 p.m. on Tuesday, April 21st and Thursday, April 23rd, 2020. Enter the drive thru by heading north on South 8th Avenue (One Way) turning into the drop off area in front of the elementary school library. Please remain in your vehicle, tell the teacher your child’s name, and supplies will be brought out and set on the sidewalk for pickup. There will also be a tote placed on the sidewalk to place any items that need to be returned to the school (i.e. textbooks, library books, etc). Any supplies or items left in your child’s classroom or locker will be in their bag.

Next Tuesday April 21st and Thursday April 23rd, from 8:00am-1:00pm. We will have an opportunity for students to get the contents of their school lockers. We will allow students to gather their belongings as well as return any school items they need to return. This would include library books, textbooks, uniforms, fundraisers and other items. Students will enter the building through the front door, drop off any belongings that they need to return. Stop by their locker and then exit the back door of the middle school. No more than four students will be allowed in the building at a time and proper social distancing needs to be maintained at all times. If there are already three students in line to enter the building please wait until you can fill in the line. Spots will be marked to assist in social distancing while waiting to get into the building. As students exit the back door to be picked up, another student will be allowed in the front door.

Next Tuesday April 21st and Thursday 23rd, we will have an opportunity for students to get the contents of their school lockers. The high school students will have times for each individual grades to come to the school and gather their belongings as well as return any school items they need to return. This would include library books, textbooks, uniforms, instruments, fundraisers and other items. Students will enter the building through the front door, drop off any belongings that they need to return. Stop by their locker and then exit the back door of the high school. No more than four students will be allowed in the building at a time and proper social distancing needs to be maintained at all times. If there are already three students in line to enter the building please wait until you fill in the line. Spots will be marked to assist in social distancing while waiting to get into the building. As students exit the back door to be picked up, another student will be allowed in the front.
Either group will be allowed to pick up from 12:00pm-1:00pm on each assigned day.

div.p: Estimados padres y miembros de la comunidad:

Nuestra esperanza es mantener la estabilidad para los estudiantes y las familias mientras brindamos un aprendizaje basado en actividades y enriquecimiento en un entorno de aprendizaje combinado. El Aprendizaje a Distancia no es solo una instrucción en línea. El propósito de esta guía es llenar los vacíos y responder cualquier pregunta que pueda tener en las próximas semanas. Nuestra metodología proporcionará enriquecimiento en línea y con paquetes basados en el hogar según sea necesario. Consulte nuestra página de Aprendizaje a Distancia en el sitio web de nuestra escuela para obtener más recursos e información. No sabemos qué traerán los próximos días en lo que respecta a la educación tradicional, pero sí sabemos que es el momento perfecto para disfrutar a su hijo y aprender junto con ellos.

strong.a: Para leer el artículo completo, haga clic aquí

div.p: Madill servirá almuerzos para llevar, recogidos en la cafetería de la escuela primaria. Para proteger mejor a los miembros de nuestro personal y a las familias, estamos ajustando nuestro horario para recoger dos veces por semana, lunes y miércoles. El horario de recogida será de 10 a.m. a 12 p.m. Consulte la información del itinerario a continuación para el servicio de comidas. Aún recibirá diez comidas en total durante la semana, pero solo le pedimos que la recoja de la siguiente manera:
Lunes: desayuno y almuerzo para Lunes y Martes
Miércoles: desayuno y almuerzo para Miércoles, Jueves y Viernes

section.h4: Parade Planned to Honor Seniors May 15; Lights to Shine to Illuminate Accomplishments

img.alt: Parade Planned to Honor Seniors May 15; Lights to Shine to Illuminate Accomplishments

a.aria-label: Full Article For Parade Planned to Honor Seniors May 15; Lights to Shine to Illuminate Accomplishments
Source Information for News from In and Around MHS

cite.a: News from In and Around MHS

p.span: Madill Public School and 98.7FM are sponsoring the Senior 2020 Celebration Parade on May 15, 2020 at 7:00pm. Seniors can decorate their vehicles and parade down Lillie and around the Square. During this time, messages from teachers and recognition of student accomplishments will play on the radio. Patrons can line the streets while tuning into the radio to support our Wildcat Seniors. Following the parade we will light up the sporting fields around town from 8-9pm. More specific information and parade route will follow in the upcoming weeks. Seniors please forward your information to Mrs. Clement as soon as possible.

div.p: Beginning April 6th, Madill will be serving grab and go lunches, picked up at the elementary cafeteria drive thru. In order to better protect our staff members and families, we are adjusting our schedule to pick up two times weekly, Monday and Wednesday. The pick-up time will remain from 10 am to 12 pm. You will still receive ten meals total for the week but only pick them up twice a week. Monday you will receive (2) – breakfast and lunches for Monday and Tuesday, Wednesday you will receive (3) – breakfast and lunches for Wednesday, Thursday and Friday.
